languages.text: "Да, мон-кай. Радуйся этим воспоминаниям пока можешь, потому что позже я заставлю тебя сильно пожалеть об этой выходке. А пока что — пока что, раз выпала такая возможность, я как следует изучу тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Да, мон-кай. Радуйся этим воспоминаниям пока можешь, потому что позже я заставлю тебя сильно пожалеть об этой выходке. А пока что — пока что, раз выпала такая возможность, я как следует изучу тебя".

languages.text: "Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. But for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."
languages.original_text: "Да, мон-кай. Радуйся этим воспоминаниям пока можешь, потому что позже я заставлю тебя сильно пожалеть об этой выходке. А пока что — пока что, раз выпала такая возможность, я как следует изучу тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. And for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."
"Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. And for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."
"Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. But for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."
"Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. But for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."
"Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. But for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."

languages.text: «Eso, mon-keigh. Disfruta de los recuerdos mientras puedas, porque pronto lamentarás tu osadía. Pero por ahora... aprovecharé la ocasión de estudiarte».
languages.original_text: "Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. But for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."

traits.locale_text: «Eso, mon-keigh. Disfruta de los recuerdos mientras puedas, porque pronto lamentarás tu osadía. Pero por ahora... aprovecharé la ocasión de estudiarte».

languages.text: “是啊，猴子。趁你还活着的时候，好好为这些愉悦的回忆沾沾自喜吧，因为我一定会让你为当初逞英雄而后悔。至于现在，只是现在而已，我打算借着这个机会研究一下你。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. But for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，猴子。趁你还活着的时候，好好为这些愉悦的回忆沾沾自喜吧，因为我一定会让你为当初逞英雄而后悔。至于现在，只是现在而已，我打算借着这个机会研究一下你。”

languages.text: 「そうだ、モン＝ケイ。今のうちに思い出に浸っておけ…いずれ調子に乗ったことを後悔させてやるからな。しかし、今は我慢しよう…この機にお前のことをよく知っておこうと思う」
languages.original_text: "Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. But for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ、モン＝ケイ。今のうちに思い出に浸っておけ…いずれ調子に乗ったことを後悔させてやるからな。しかし、今は我慢しよう――この機にお前のことをよく知っておこうと思う」

languages.text: "Ja, Chem-Pan-Sey. Suhlt Euch in diesen Erinnerungen, solange Ihr noch könnt, denn ich werde werde dafür sorgen, dass Ihr diese Aktion bereut. Aber für den Moment ... für den Moment werde ich die Gelegenheit nutzen, um Euch zu studieren."
languages.original_text: "Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. But for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Chem-Pan-Sey. Suhlt Euch in diesen Erinnerungen, solange Ihr noch könnt, denn ich werde werde dafür sorgen, dass Ihr diese Aktion bereut. Aber für den Moment ... für den Moment werde ich die Gelegenheit nutzen, um Euch zu studieren."

languages.original_text: "Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. But for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."

languages.text: « Oui, mon-keigh. Délectez-vous de ces souvenirs tant que vous le pouvez, car j'ai bien l'intention de vous faire regretter cet affront. Pour l'heure, cependant, je veux profiter de cette occasion pour vous étudier. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. But for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, mon-keigh. Délectez-vous de ces souvenirs tant que vous le pouvez, car j'ai bien l'intention de vous faire regretter cet affront. Pour l'heure, cependant, je veux profiter de cette occasion pour vous étudier. »

languages.text: "Doğrudur mon-keigh. Hâlâ fırsatın varken o hatıralarını yâd et zira seni yaptıklarına feci pişman edeceğim. Şu an içinse fırsattan istifade seni incelemek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Yes, mon-keigh. Revel in those memories while you still can, because I will make you regret that stunt of yours yet. But for now — for now, I will take this opportunity to study you."

traits.locale_text: "Doğrudur mon-keigh. Hâlâ fırsatın varken o hatıralarını yâd et zira seni yaptıklarına feci pişman edeceğim. Şu an içinse fırsattan istifade seni incelemek istiyorum."
